text.tspan: Don't list me as a donor, please
Save money and don't send me a gift

flowRoot.flowPara: As a thank you for your generous support, we'll send you a t-shirt
Localized, EUR for Europe, USD for America
Donate and Become a Friend of GNOME
A really good copy on why GNOME is a good thing for you and the world but it needs to be short and effective.
See who's already a Friend of GNOME

text.tspan: Make my impact bigger and make this monthly
